Question
========

Suppose the height of Dutch men has a normal distribution with a mean of 175 centimeters and a standard deviation of 7.5 centimeter. What then is the percentage of men taller than 180 centimeters?

Answerlist
----------

* 25%
* 65%
* 70%
* 97%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 25%: Correct
* 65%: Incorrect
* 70%: Incorrect
* 97%: Incorrect
